Name: James Jerome Mack
Description:
James was beaten with beer bottles, sexually assaulted with a broom handle, strangled with an electrical cord and then drowned in a bathtub.

His body was later set on fire in a trash can behind a church.

> The charred remains of 17-year-old James Jerome Mack were discovered by church workers Monday morning.
>
> Homicide detectives believe he was killed Sunday night after visiting someone at a Buffalo apartment and getting involved in a card game. At some point, the five people turned on Mack and took turns beating and sexually assaulting him before strangling him, police said.
>
> Police said the group then put his body in a trash can and wheeled it behind a church, where they set it on fire.
>
> Arrested on charges of second-degree murder and sexual assault were William Lauderdale, 20; Terry Mixon, 19; and Anthony Giles, Kareemaha Luper and Antonio Walker, all 18.

https://buffalonews.com/news/teen-tortured-police-say-five-charged-in-slaying-could-face-death-penalty/article_24616ec9-af8f-58ad-9c66-7ba85de0717a.html

Name: Brandi Houston
Description:
Brandi was strangled by Richard Masterson who claimed that her death was an accident. Masterson was executed by lethal injection in 2016.

The media reported that Brandi was a drag queen or "female impersonator".

> HUNTSVILLE - Richard Allen Masterson, a convicted killer who once encouraged jurors to sentence him to death, was executed Wednesday for the 2001 strangulation of a professional Houston female impersonator.
> 
> As the killer's family and friends watched from a barred witness room, Masterson raised his head and directed a kiss in their direction.
> 
> In his final remarks, he said that he was being sent to a "better place."
> 
> "I am all right with this," he said. "You have to live and die by the choices we make. I have made mine."
